Contact
München
Full Time

Grafik / Design (m/w/d)

You support the development of an external presence (incl. social media strategy) for the topic area 4zero. You improve the external effectiveness of the 4zero brand in the direction of new customer and personnel acquisition. The analysis of suitable media (web, print, congresses, trade fairs etc.) and the active support and participation in the implementation are part of your tasks. You organize trade fairs and the publication of professional articles.

worldwide
Full Time

Software Web Frontend Engineer

Design and implementation of enterprise level, highly scalable, fault tolerant systems in production quality. Writing clean and maintainable code using standard software development techniques. Improving yourself by learning about and investigating new technologies. Understanding and clarification of project requirements and specification. Developing a feature with high level of independence. Cooperation with team-members and other teams.

worldwide
Full Time

Software Web Backend Engineer

Design and implementation of enterprise level, highly scalable, fault tolerant systems in production quality. Writing clean and maintainable code using standard software development techniques. Improving yourself by learning about and investigating new technologies. Understanding and clarification of project requirements and specification. Developing a feature with high level of independence. Cooperation with team-members and other teams.

Germany
Full Time

Software Developer

You will be responsible for the Creation of a system that interconnects all test stations into a real time view of, operation metrics, efficiency, yield, throughput, etc), requires to connect Labview functions and text logs with matlab/C# dlls to implement automation functions with various control systems such as MES, Owncloud, Arena ERP, smartsheets, etc. Through the use of APIs where available or creation of them when required. You will implicate Python process automation and data organization & analysis. You are proficient on working with web based Backend (C#) as well as Front end of applications. (any of javascript, angular, css, etc)
